title: How-To: O365 Event Ingest into LogScale via Microsoft Graph (using pre-defined CrowdStream O365 Activity/Services)
description:
Describes how to collect Office 365 events into LogScale via Microsoft Graph and CrowdStream/Cribl,
including app registration, permissions, and wiring content subscriptions to a LogScale destination.

examples.name: Conceptual ingest flow
examples.description: Office 365 -> Microsoft Graph -> CrowdStream/Cribl -> LogScale ingest.
examples.query: O365 -> Graph API -> CrowdStream route -> LogScale /api/v1/ingest/hec
